title: These NYC neighborhoods see homeowners stay put the longest — and the shortest: study
description: New Yorkers may be famous for sticking it out — but not all boroughs hold residents equally long.  A new analysis from PropertyShark shows homeowners kept their properties for an average of about 11 years before selling in 2025. However, the picture changes s…
content:
New Yorkers may be famous for sticking it out but not all boroughs hold residents equally long.
